#labels Phase-Implementation
#Summary of functions in the audio code

= constructor audBackground=

==Description==
	This contructs a background source
{{{
	audBackground(
		int buffersize
	);
}}}
==Parameters==

	* _buffersize_ - The size of the buffer queue, more buffers means more memory

<br>
=destructor ~audBackground=

==Description==
	This cleans up the background class
{{{
	~audBackground();
}}}
<br>
=audLoadDir=

==Description==
	This loads the files from the directory
{{{
	int audLoadDir(
		string folder,
		string type = ""
	);
}}}
==Parameters==

	* _folder_ - The folder with the files to load
	* _type_ - The type of file to load, "" loads all files in folder

==Returns==

	* _int_ - 0 if successful, others if unsuccessful (error returns not determined)
<br>
=audChangeDir=

==Description==
	This unloads the current directory and loads the files from the new directory
{{{
	int audChangeDir{
		string folder,
		string type = ""
	);
}}}
==Parameters==

	* _folder_ - The folder with the files to load
	* _type_ - The type of file to load, "" loads all files in folder

==Returns==

	* _int_ - 0 if successful, others if unsuccessful (error returns not determined)
<br>
=audCheck=

==Description==
	This checks the status of the background audio
{{{
	ALint audCheck();
}}}

==Returns==

	* _ALint_ - Status for the background audio
<br>
=audUpdateQueue=

==Description==
	This removes played files from the queue, loads the next files into the buffer, then adds it to the queue to keep the queue at the buffersize
{{{
	int audUpdateQueue(
		int play
	);
}}}
==Parameters==

	* _play_ - decides if the queue will be restarted if it is stoped, 1 for yes and 0 for no

==Returns==

	* _int_ - 0 if successful, others if unsuccessful (error returns not determined)
<br>
=audPlay=

==Description==
	This starts playing the background audio
{{{
	int audPlay();
}}}
==Returns==

	* _int_ - 0 if successful, others if unsuccessful (error returns not determined)
<br>
=audStop=

==Description==
	This stops playing the background audio
{{{
	int audStop();
}}}
==Returns==

	* _int_ - 0 if successful, others if unsuccessful (error returns not determined)
